meanings: this affair[case, matter], the pending case, the case in question

phrases.phrase: 이렇게 유쾌한 영화를 본 건 오랜만이야.
meanings: 영화 I haven't seen anything so pleasant for a long time.
(눈으로) see, watch, look (at), catch sight (of); (처음으로) set[lay, clap] eyes (on); (목격하다) spot, witness

meanings.meaning: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.

vlive.korean: [본 건 있음] - 환자분 잠시만요 괜찮으세요? - 환자분 괜찮으세요? [Saw something] - Wait a minute, are you OK? - Are you all right patient? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.13
vlive.english: [Saw something] - Wait a minute, are you OK? - Are you all right patient?

vlive.korean: 제가 지금까지 제일 많이 본 건... The song that was most mentioned was... 듣기 View video AB6IX : FM11.02📻🐦 #3
vlive.english: The song that was most mentioned was...

vlive.korean: 실시간으로 본 건 처음이라... It was the first time I saw that in real time. 듣기 View video VICTON : 🎉VICTON 데뷔 1000일 기념 하.땅.사 VLIVE🎉💛💙 VICTON Debut 1000th Day V LIVE

vlive.korean: [(게임 끝) 총총 썬 파로 화룡점정] 본 건 있어서... [(Game over) Sliced green onions are the finishing stroke] I've seen it from somewhere. 듣기 View video 펫셔니스타 탱구 - SM CCC LAB : [펫셔니스타 탱구┃Petionista Taengoo] EP.03 숨겨진 세상으로 part 2 (into the LA ②)

examples.korean: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto. 발음듣기 본 차용 계약서는 본 건 소지인에게 해당 건물들과 거기에 딸린 모든 대지의 사용권을 준다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto. 발음

examples.korean: I’m just speaking off the cuff here—I haven't seen the results yet. 발음듣기 전 지금 즉흥적으로 말씀드리는 겁니다. 제가 아직 그 결과를 본 건 아니에요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m just speaking off the cuff here—I haven't seen the results yet. 발음

examples.korean: I’m just speaking off the cuff here—I haven’t seen the results yet. 발음듣기 전 지금 즉흥적으로 말씀드리는 겁니다. 제가 아직 그 결과를 본 건 아니에요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Have you recovered[retrieved] some of your loss? 발음듣기 손해 본 건 좀 건졌습니까? Neungyule
examples.english: Have you recovered[retrieved] some of your loss? 발음

examples.korean: At least you didn't lose anything--I lost about thirty percent of what I had a year ago. 발음듣기 그래도 당신은 손해 본 건 없죠. 난 1년 전보다 한 30%는 까먹었다구요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At least you didn't lose anything--I lost about thirty percent of what I had a year ago. 발음
